document.full_text: after his party had a poor showing in state elections, guido westerwelle decided to give up two political posts, but his future as the german foreign minister remained in doubt.
document.title: question hangs over future of german foreign minister
lines_and_colors: after his party had a poor showing in state elections, guido westerwelle decided to give up two political posts, but his future as the german foreign minister remained in doubt.
